name: en-US
about_story1: Hi, I'm Daniel and I hate to leave my bike at LBS for weeks to gather dust and wait for a fix. So... I'm working on Bikecheck!
about_story2: Thats the main reason, but the scope grew. Now I want to create a platform that connects bikeshops with customers and smooths the expirience for both sides.
about_story3: For the moment its but a landing page, to gather leads and ideas, feel free to let me know if you have any.
contact_desc: Do you own a bikeshop? Lets talk.
contact_story1: Have something to say? Feature idea?
contact_story2: Way to improve your daily work?
contact_story4: Fill up the form or send me an email.

features.title: Find your LBS
features.description: Use our search and find your local bikeshop. We have a map that will help you out.

features.title: Choose services
features.description: Figure out what type of service or maintanance you need. Bikeshops have a list of services that you can choose from.

features.title: Book a date
features.description: Check avaliable date and book it, if you know your service technician you can directly book to them.

features.title: Get notified
features.description: Bikeshop accepts your request and when the time comes, we will mail you remind you to drop off your bike.

features.title: Wait for it
features.description: Now its all up to the bikeshop. When they are all done or something comes out they will contanct you.

features.title: Pick up your ride
features.description: It's time for you to have fun, grab your bike and remember to check out if all required maintanance was performed.

features.title: Bike history
features.description: Bikeshop will register a maintanance under your bike history, so you could have it all in one place.

features.title: Rate your service
features.description: Now you can share your expirience, rating and reviewing your service.

hero_header: Book and service your bike with us
hero_desc: Bikecheck! is a website that will help you find local bike service, book and service your bike. We are here so you could be on your bike more.

bikeshopFeatures.title: Bikeshop profile
bikeshopFeatures.description: Use us as your business card, get new customers and keep your business in the know.

bikeshopFeatures.title: Services
bikeshopFeatures.description: Create detailed services for your customers, so they could book and get them done.

bikeshopFeatures.title: Calendar
bikeshopFeatures.description: Customers will book your services directly from your calendar, set a timeframe and accept them, plan your work accordingly.

bikeshopFeatures.title: Tasks
bikeshopFeatures.description: Create and manage tasks based on calendar events so your team could be more efficient.

bikeshopFeatures.title: Contact customers
bikeshopFeatures.description: While working on the bike things can go south, get in touch with your customer through an app and work it out.

bikeshopFeatures.title: Unclutter your space
bikeshopFeatures.description: Customers will get notified when to drop off their bikes based on calendar events, you will have them just in time to work on them.

bikeshopFeatures.title: Dashboard
bikeshopFeatures.description: Get a dashboard with all of your important information for current day.

bikeshopFeatures.title: All from the web
bikeshopFeatures.description: Access it all through a web browser, no need to download anything.

sliding_header: We are here so you could
cta_header: Do you want to know more?
